section.para: To view purchase price variances by item, select the Price Variances by Item option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying purchase price variances by item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the item number of the item whose price variances you want to view. The lookup feature located to the right of the field leads to a searchable list of make and buy items.
Select to display price variances by item for all sites.
Specify site whose price variances by item you want to display.
Select to display price variances by item for all purchasing agents.
Specify purchasing agent whose price variances by item you want to display. Users may be designated as purchasing agents at the system level.
